stimulusHtml: The Chesapeake Bay is a watershed that is located in six states and the District of Columbia. Which of the following can cause an increase in water pollution in the watershed?
choicesHtml: An increase in the number of grasses, trees, and shrubs near a watershed
An increase in the natural systems near a watershed
An increase in stormwater runoff in urban areas
A decrease in the number of impervious surfaces near the watershed
